title: PMC登陆问题
author: PETER·篠
txt_content:
本帖最后由 PETER·篠 于 2015-4-22 18:23 编辑 

如果你今天登陆PMC，上方可能会出现这样一段话：

看不清的可以看这里：This page (http://www.planetminecraft.com/) is currently offline. However, because the site uses CloudFlare's Always Online? technology you can continue to surf a snapshot of the site. We will keep checking in the background and, as soon as the site comes back, you will automatically be served the live version. Always Online? is powered by CloudFlare
大概意思：此页面（http://www.planetminecraft.com/）目前处于离线状态。但是，由于该网站使用了CloudFlare的永恒在线技术?，您可以继续浏览该网站的快照。我们将继续在后台修复，只要链接回来，您便会自动送达至这里。永痕在线是CloudFlare的技术。
@月轻歌 @__Tong__ @zxc554989965 ，你们有没有出现无法进入地图链接的问题？

replies.author: 酉月一
replies.txt_content: 诶？啥时候的事，中午还下了个东西
